resources.string: Please download the model from the model selector before using it.
This will permanently delete this message. This action cannot be undone.
This will delete the current response and generate a new one. This action cannot be undone.
Start a new chat to begin talking with your AI
Add your API key in Settings
Choose a system prompt for this persona
To use memory or RAG, you need to download an embedding model in settings.
To use memory or RAG, you need to download an embedding model in settings.
Enter your API key to use %s
Your key is stored encrypted on your device
For cloud models (Deepseek, OpenAI, Grok) ‚Ä¢ Total: %d
How creative your AI can sound
How chaotic your AI can be
How many messages to send to API models ‚Ä¢ Local models always use last message
This model will be auto-selected when using this persona
This prompt is synced with the selected SystemPrompt. To edit it, go to Settings > System Prompts.
Allow other personas to access these memories
Add documents in RAG section first
Retry: Will delete this attempt and try again
Cancel: Will copy your message to clipboard and delete the failed attempt
How deeply your AI can hear you
How AI finds focus points ‚Ä¢ Required: {text}
Set your Project URL and API Key
Your connection string is stored encrypted on your device

1. Go to supabase.com
2. Open your project
3. Settings ‚Üí API
4. Copy Project URL and anon/public key

Direct connection from your phone!
No backend server needed!
Connection successful! You can now save and enable sync.

The app calculates current size of your syncable data (conversations, messages, memories, personas). Progress bar shows estimated usage relative to 500 MB free tier. Embeddings and RAG documents are NOT synced (stored locally only). For accurate cloud usage check Supabase Dashboard: Settings ‚Üí Database ‚Üí Database Size
Free: 500 MB DB, 5 GB bandwidth\nPro ($25/month): 8 GB DB, 250 GB bandwidth
Go to Supabase website and create an account
Copy and save the database password in a secure place, then click Create new project
Scroll down and copy Project URL and Publishable API KEY. Save them ‚Äî you\'ll need them for app setup
Scroll up and go to SQL Editor
Paste the SQL query into Untitled query form and click Run
Make sure Results section shows successful execution confirmation
Return to app and go to Settings ‚Üí Cloud Sync ‚Üí Supabase Configuration
Paste saved Project URL and Publishable API KEY. Click Test Connection and wait for successful connection
Web Search enabled - searching the internet
ùïè Search enabled - searching posts on X (Twitter)
Models for semantic search and RAG
Use cloud API instead of local model
‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Recalculate all embeddings after switching embedding models
What you want to teach your AI - documents, notes, conversations
Text size for each document chunk
‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Recalculate embeddings after changing chunk size or overlap if you want to update existing fragments
What AI does with knowledge documents
What you want your AI to know about you
Information about you or anything else
Customize how AI extracts memories ‚Ä¢ Required: {text}
Only retrieve memories older than X days
Manage memory settings and saved memories
Isolated memories not linked to any theme
AI hasn\'t formed a biography yet
Are you sure you want to delete the biography? This action cannot be undone.
Shows progress of user biography generation
User biography has been successfully generated
AI will remove outdated memories and merge duplicates based on your biography.

1. Update Biography first
2. Then clean memory

This ensures AI uses the latest information.
Change theme, colors, and text size
Select a system prompt to customize its AI behavior
No API system prompts available. Add one in System Prompts section.
Personas allow you to create different AI personalities with unique settings, memory scopes, and document access. Perfect for separating work, personal, or specialized conversations.
Memories will appear here as the AI learns about this persona
‚ö†Ô∏è When changing language, only default prompts (Default API, Default Local) will be updated. Separately created custom prompts will remain unchanged.
Copy these SQL commands and run them in Supabase SQL Editor:

1. Copy SQL (button below)
2. Open Supabase ‚Üí SQL Editor
3. Paste and click Run
4. Wait for success message
Enable Memory in settings to start saving
This prompt is used to extract memories from your messages.
This will restore the original memory extraction prompt. Your current changes will be lost.
This will also delete the linked Persona and all its settings. This action cannot be undone.
Customize how AI uses enhanced context (memories + RAG)
Customize what AI do with memories
Customize what AI do with knowledge documents
Customize the prompt for Deep Empathy mode
This prompt is sent to AI when user replies to a message
Add your first document to get started
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"? This action cannot be undone.
Link documents to Personas in Settings ‚Üí Personas
Enter text or import from file
These models convert text into vectors for semantic search in your knowledge base and memories
Run AI on your device, no internet needed
Models are downloaded from Hugging Face and stored locally
What you want your AI to know about you
‚Ä¢ My name is... I work as...
Dynamic colors adapt to your wallpaper (Android 12+)
Adjust text size for better readability
Preview: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
This prompt analyzes messages to find dialogue focus points
This will restore the original analysis prompt. Your current changes will be lost.
Large chat (%d chars). Use \'Save to File\' for import.
